Wide Lens.name: Wide Lens
Wide Lens.effects: Increases width of beam by 15%, decreases beam range by 25%

Power Bulb.name: Power Bulb
Power Bulb.effects: Increases brightness of beam by 20%, increases blindness duration by 10%

TIR Optic.name: TIR Optic
TIR Optic.effects: Increases brightness by 30%, increases blindness duration by 15%

Focus Lens.name: Focus Lens
Focus Lens.effects: Extends range by 25%, increases brightness by 20%, increases blindness by 10%, decreases width by 15%

Intense Halogen.name: Intense Halogen
Intense Halogen.effects: Increases brightness by 40%, inreases blindness duration by 20%

High-End Sapphire Lens.name: High-End Sapphire Lens
High-End Sapphire Lens.effects: Increases range by 25%, increases brightness by 30%, increases blindness duration by 15%, increases width by 25%

Odd Bulb.name: Odd Bulb
Odd Bulb.effects: Increases brightness by 50%, increases blindness duration by 25%, increases depletion rate by 14%

Broken Bulb.name: Broken Bulb
Broken Bulb.effects: Causes the flashlight to flicker, increases brightness by 30%, increases blindness duration by 15%, increases spookiness

Rubber Gloves.name: Rubber Gloves
Rubber Gloves.effects: Increases Great Skill Check progression by 3%

Sponge.name: Sponge
Sponge.effects: Increases Great Skill Check progression by 5%

Self Adherent Wrap.name: Self Adherent Wrap
Self Adherent Wrap.effects: Increases available charges by 8, increases healing speed by 5%

Needle & Thread.name: Needle & Thread
Needle & Thread.effects: Increases healing speed by 15%, increases trigger odds of Skill Checks by 10%, grants 100% bonus BP for Great Skill Checks

Needle & Thread.name: Surgical Suture
Needle & Thread.effects: Increases healing speed by 15%, increases trigger odds of Skill Checks by 15%, grants 150% bonus BP for Great Skill Checks

Needle & Thread.name: Abdominal Dressing
Needle & Thread.effects: Increases healing speed by 25%, decreases available charges by 8

Needle & Thread.name: Styptic Agent
Needle & Thread.effects: Applies the Endurance status effect for 8 seconds

Needle & Thread.name: Anti-Hemorrhagic Syringe
Needle & Thread.effects: Over 16 seconds the survivor will gain 1 health state | medkit is consumed on use, affected by healing speed modifiers and cancelled by change of health state | can be used on self or other survivors

Needle & Thread.name: Refined Serum
Needle & Thread.effects: Increases movement speed by 5% for 16 seconds, leaves a Blight trail behind the affected survivor, consumes medkit on use and can be used on yourself or other survivors

key addons.name: Eroded Token
key addons.effects: Unlocks Aura reading ability to see all survivors within 24m

key addons.name: Gold Token
key addons.effects: Unlocks Aura reading ability to see all survivors within 48m

key addons.name: Weaved Ring
key addons.effects: On death, key is not lost, lose this addon instead

key addons.name: Milky Glass
key addons.effects: Upon opening the hatch, key is not lost, lose this addon instead

key addons.name: Blood Amber
key addons.effects: Unlocks Aura reading ability to see the killer within 32m, increases depletion rate by 100%

key addons.name: Unique Wedding Ring
key addons.effects: Unlocks Aura reading ability to see the Obsession within 32m, lowers odds of becoming the obsession by 100%

map addons.name: Yellow Wire
map addons.effects: Unlocks the ability to track Exit Gates

map addons.name: Red Twine
map addons.effects: Unlocks the ability to track Killer belongings

map addons.name: Glass Bead
map addons.effects: Place a pillar of lighat your current location that is visible to all survivors

map addons.name: Black Silk Cord
map addons.effects: Unlocks the ability to track the hatch

map addons.name: Crystal Bead
map addons.effects: Reveals the Auras generated by the map to all survivors

toolbox addons.name: Spring Clamp
toolbox addons.effects: Decreases distance repairs can be heard from by 8m

toolbox addons.name: Protective Gloves
toolbox addons.effects: Removes the Loud Noise Notification from sabotaging a hook

toolbox addons.name: Grip Wrench
toolbox addons.effects: Increases the auto repair timer for hooks sabotaged by 15 seconds

toolbox addons.name: Brand New Part
toolbox addons.effects: Takes 5 seconds to install, adds 15% to generator progression. Triggers 2 difficult skillchecks during installation process, successful completion adds 5% extra progression up to a total of 25% progression
